div.p:
Welcome to Stanley-Boyd Area Schools. You will see the words, “Every Child Will Learn at a High Level” throughout our website. That is more than a motto. It is what we believe. It is what we do. It is who we are.
Jeff Koenig, Superintendent

p.span: Our first grade #SBOrioles working on some fantastic hands on learning! Our families and staff are incredible! 💯
Connor is working very hard and adjusting to online learning 😊 #SBOrioles
First graders are excelling at distance learning! #SBOrioles
Our #SBOrioles have been climbing the ladder of success for years! #ThrowbackThursday
This little 4k #SBOrioles is working hard on his shapes.
Nine students joined a class meeting to play their favorite game, Kahoot! They competed against each other and practiced math at the same time. #SBOrioles fun!
We are proud of these hard working boys. Their momma is also proud of how hard they have been working at home. #SBOrioles
First grade looks a bit different these days. We are so proud of our families and staff for making the very best of these difficult days! #SBOrioles
This fourth grader found the “purrfect” way to complete his reading assignment! #SBOrioles 🐈
Traveling the world one book at a time! 🌎 #SBOrioles #MotivationalMonday

"Art is as natural as sunshine and vital as nourishment" - MaryAnn F. Kohl Despite being away from friends, teachers and a lot of our family these past weeks, our young Orioles are not letting this...
Just a quick selfie between recording sessions! Setting up a bunch of videos walking through grammar with Screencastify at the High School level for Spanish! We miss being able to do this in class...
Please drive by Oriole Park tonight April 10th from 8-8:20pm. #BeTheLightWI #SBOrioles
Mr. Helmsing’s fifth grade #SBOrioles enjoyed performing Chilili, a traditional Bolivian folk dance, in music class a few weeks ago.💃🏽
